title: The Prime Minister represents the President of the Republic at the inauguration ceremony of the Nigerien President
text: Representing the President of the Republic, Mr Abdelmadjid Tebboune, the Prime Minister, Mr Abdelaziz Djerad, accompanied by Minister of Foreign Affairs, Mr Sabri Boukadoum, participated in the swearing-in ceremony of the elected President of Niger, Mr Mohamed Bazoum.

The Prime Minister delivered, on the same occasion, a handwritten message from Mister President Tebboune to his Nigerien counterpart. At the end of the ceremony, the Prime Minister was received by the new President of Niger, to whom he conveyed the greetings of the President of the Republic and his wishes for success in his noble missions.
